name: Baby Snatcher
description:
You have tracked down your worthy heir to that of a dank orphanage. You must Infiltrate and escape without being seen once, using you're ability to turn invisible and play a flute that sends people to sleep but has only a finite amount of uses. 

This game was loosely inspired by my first Paralysis Demon experience and was made for the Weekly Game Jam (though we started very late) by me making the code and my incredibly talented friend Lizzie Steele( https://www.instagram.com/lizzie_steele_/ ) making the art, I recommend checking her out she does much more amazing stuff.
